mapper.select: SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , SELL_TP_CD , SELL_TP_DTL_CD , CASE WHEN SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21', '23') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS ISLEASE FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

WITH W1 AS (SELECT * FROM TB_CBCL_BZNS_ATAM_BAS -- 영업선수금 WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}) , W2 AS (SELECT C.CNTR_NO , C.CNTR_SN , A.CNTR_CH_RCP_ID , A.CNTR_CH_SN , TO_DATE(B.CNTR_CH_FSH_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNTR_CH_FSH_DT , TO_DATE(C.CNTR_PD_STRTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SL_DT , (CASE WHEN C.CNTR_PD_STRTDT IS NULL THEN 'PD' ELSE 'SL' END) AS GUBUN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_CH_RCP_DTL A -- 계약변경접수상세 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_CH_RCP_BAS B -- 계약변경접수기본 ON A.CNTR_CH_RCP_ID = B.CNTR_CH_RCP_ID AND B.CNTR_CH_TP_CD = '201' -- 계약변경 유형코드(201 : 계약상세/상품변경) AND B.APR_DTM IS NOT NULL -- 승인일시 AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C ON C.CNTR_NO = A.DTL_CNTR_NO AND C.CNTR_SN = A.DTL_CNTR_SN AND C.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.DTL_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A.DTL_CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') SELECT ---------------------------------------------------------------- -- 계약사항 ---------------------------------------------------------------- T1.CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO -- 계약번호 , T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , T1.CNTR_NO || '-' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO , T1.SELL_TP_CD AS SELL_TP_CD , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'SELL_TP_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T1.SELL_TP_CD) AS SELL_TP_CD_NM -- 판매유형코드명 , T1.CST_NO AS CST_NO , T4.CST_KNM AS CST_KNM -- 고객명 , T4.COPN_DV_CD AS COPN_DV_CD , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'COPN_DV_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T4.COPN_DV_CD) AS COPN_DV_CD_NM -- 고객구분 , T2.SELL_PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO -- 판매자사번 , T5.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_KNM -- 판매자이름 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(T2.CNTR_CNFM_DTM, 1, 8)), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNTR_DT --계약일 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T3.CNTR_PD_STRTDT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SL_DT -- 매출일자 , (CASE WHEN T3.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301', '302', '303') THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T3.CNTR_PD_ENDDT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '' END) AS CAN_DT --취소일 , T5.OG_NM AS OG_NM -- 조직명 , T5.OG_CD AS OG_CD -- 조직코드 , T5.OG_NM || '(' || T5.OG_CD || ')' AS OG_INFO -- 조직정보 , T1.PD_CD AS PD_CD -- 상품코드 , T6.PD_NM AS PD_NM -- 상품명 , T1.PD_CD || '(' || T6.PD_NM || ')' AS PD_INFO -- 상품정보 , T3.DSC_AMT AS DSC_AMT -- 할인금액 , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = (SELECT CM2.USER_DFN_02 AS ID FROM T_CMZ_CD_D CM2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CM2.CD_ID = 'SELL_DSC_TP_CD' --DSC_APY_TP_CD AND CM2.PRTS_CD_VLD_VAL = T3.SELL_TP_CD AND CM2.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS') AND CD_VLD_VAL = T3.SELL_DSC_TP_CD ) AS DSC_TP -- 할인유형코드(LC30.LCETC4) , T3.ALNCMP_CD AS ALNCMP_CD -- 제휴사코드 , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'ALNCMP_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T3.ALNCMP_CD) AS ALNCMP_CD_NM -- 제휴상태(LC30.LCCK03) , T7.SELL_EV_CD AS SELL_EV_CD -- 행사코드 , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'SELL_EV_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T7.SELL_EV_CD) AS SELL_EV_CD_NM --행사정보(LC30.LCETC9) , T1.SELL_AMT AS SELL_AMT --판매가격 , (SELECT SUM(NVL(ALNC_FEE, 0)) FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL -- 수납상세 WHERE CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') AS ALNC_FEE -- 제휴수수료(LC30.LCFAMT) , T1.CNTR_AMT AS SUBSC_AMT -- 청약금 ※TO-BE는 청약금+인수금(CWSAMT+CWAAMT) 하나로 관리 , T3.CRP_UC_AMT AS CRP_UC_AMT -- 법인미수금액(LC30.LCGAMT) , T1.ISTM_PCAM_AMT AS ISTM_PCAM_AMT-- 잔액(CW50.CWJAMT(할부원금) 값이 0이면, LC30.LCJAMT 값) , T1.ISTM_MCN AS ISTM_MCN -- 할부개월(CW50.CWMONT) , T1.MM_ISTM_AMT AS MM_ISTM_AMT -- 월할부금액(CW50.CWMAMT) , T1.ISTM_MCN || '*' || T1.MM_ISTM_AMT AS ISTM_INFO --할부정보 , T1.ISTM_FEE_LVY_AMT AS ISTM_FEE_LVY_AMT -- 수수료금액(CW50.CWCAMT 값이 0이면, LC30.LCCAMT) ---------------------------------------------------------------- -- 변경사항 ---------------------------------------------------------------- , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.FULPY_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FULPY_DT -- 완불일자 @TO-DO 최초완불일자(CW50.CWLSTY)가 있는 데이터는 완불일자로 이행필요(양쪽 다 있는건은 실제 완불여부 확인 후 이행하기로 함) , (SELECT MAX(CNTR_CH_FSH_DT) FROM W2) AS CNTR_CHN_DT --변동일자(CW50.CWCHGY) , CASE WHEN T9.ACDBT_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '대손' ELSE ' ' END AS CWKGUBNM -- 계정구분(CW50.CWKGUB) CASE WHEN CW50.CWKGUB='2' THEN '대손' ELSE ' ' END AS CWKGUBNM , (SELECT MAX(CNTR_CH_FSH_DT) FROM W2 WHERE GUBUN = 'PD') AS PD_CH_DT -- 상변일자(LC30.LCCHGY) 매출일자 이전에 계약변경이 처리되었으면 상변일자 셋팅 , (SELECT MAX(CNTR_CH_FSH_DT) FROM W2 WHERE GUBUN = 'SL') AS SL_CH_DT -- 매변일자(LC30.LCMAEY) , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM W2 WHERE GUBUN = 'SL') AS SL_CH_SN -- 매변일련번호(CW45.CWSEQN) ---------------------------------------------------------------- -- 입금사항 ---------------------------------------------------------------- , (SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT*-1,0) END), 0) FROM W1 WHERE RVE_DV_CD = '03') AS ISTM_TOT_DP_AMT -- 할부입금액(CW50.CWPAMT) , (SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT*-1,0) END), 0) FROM W1 WHERE RVE_DV_CD = '01') AS SUBSC_TOT_DP_AMT -- 청약입금액(ASIS쿼리에는 조회하지 않음) , (SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT*-1,0) END), 0) FROM W1 WHERE RVE_DV_CD = '06') AS SL_CH_TOT_DP_AMT -- 매변입금액(CW45.CWPAMT) , (SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT*-1,0) END), 0) FROM W1) AS TOT_DP_AMT -- 입금총액(대손입금액도 포함해 둠) , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'DP_TP_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T14.DP_TP_CD) AS DP_TP_CD -- 이체구분코드(LC31.LCCHK1) , T14.MPY_BSDT AS MPY_BSDT -- 이체일자 ---------------------------------------------------------------- -- 연체사항 ---------------------------------------------------------------- , T8.DLQ_MCN AS DLQ_MCN -- 연체개월수(CW50.CWDCNT) , T8.EOT_DLQ_AMT AS THM_OC_DLQ_AMT -- 연체금액(CW50.CWDAMT) , T1.SELL_AMT - (SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT*-1,0) END), 0) FROM W1) AS UC_BLAM --미수금액(CW50.CWQAMT - (CW50.CWSAMT + CW50.CWAAMT + CW50.CWPAMT)) , '' AS UC_PRT --미수출력(CW50.CWFLG2) @TO-DO ---------------------------------------------------------------- -- 대손사항 ---------------------------------------------------------------- , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T9.ACDBT_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ACDBT_DT -- 대손일자(CW50.CWBDDT) , T9.DFA_AMT AS DFA_AMT --대손금액(CW50.CWAMT4) , (SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT*-1,0) END), 0) FROM W1 WHERE RVE_DV_CD = '09') AS DFA_DP_AMT -- 대손입금액(CW5400P.CWAMT1) , T9.DFA_AMT - (SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT,0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT*-1,0) END), 0) FROM W1 WHERE RVE_DV_CD = '09') AS DFA_BLAM -- 대손잔액(대손금액 - 대손입금액) , (SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(RVE_DT)), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') FROM W1 WHERE RVE_DV_CD = '09' AND DP_DV_CD = '1') AS DFA_RVE_DT -- 대손납입일자(CW5400P.CWACTY) ---------------------------------------------------------------- -- 집금정보 ---------------------------------------------------------------- , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T11.BND_ASN_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BND_ASN_DT -- 수임일자(CW50.CWPRTY) , T11.CLCTAM_DV_CD AS CLCTAM_DV_CD -- 집금구분(CW49.CWPGUB) , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'CLCTAM_DV_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T11.CLCTAM_DV_CD) AS CLCTAM_DV_CD_NM , T11.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AS CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO -- 집금담당자사번(CW50.CWPRTY) , (SELECT NVL(MAX(PRTNR_KNM), '') FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL WHERE PRTNR_NO = T11.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO ) AS CLCTAM_PRTNR_KNM --집금담당자명 , T2.DSB_GUR_TP_CD AS DSB_GUR_TP_CD -- 지급보증유형(CW50.CWJFLG) , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'DSB_GUR_TP_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T2.DSB_GUR_TP_CD) AS DSB_GUR_TP_CD_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T12.BU_NOTI_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BU_NOTI_DT -- 부담통보일자(CW50.CWSTBY) , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T10.REDF_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REDF_DT -- 되물림일자(CW50.CWSMLY) , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T10.ADSB_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADSB_DT -- 재지급일자(CW50.CWSJGY) , T12.BU_NOTI_TP_CD AS BU_NOTI_TP_CD -- 통보내용(CW50.CWTFLG) , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'BU_NOTI_TP_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T12.BU_NOTI_TP_CD) AS BU_NOTI_TP_CD_NM , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'BNK_CD_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = T15.VAC_BNK_CD) AS VAC_BNK_CD -- 은행명 , T15.VAC_NO AS VAC_NO -- 가상계좌번호 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T1 -- WELLS매출월마감내역 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T2 -- 계약기본 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T3 -- 계약상세 ON T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T4 --고객기본 ON T4.CST_NO = T1.CST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T5 --파트너기본 ON T5.OG_TP_CD = T2.SELL_OG_TP_CD AND T5.PRTNR_NO = T2.SELL_PRTNR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T6 --상품기본 ON T6.PD_CD = T1.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL T7 --계약WELLS상세 ON T7.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T7.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS T8 -- 연체기본 ON T8.PERF_YM = T1.SL_CL_YM AND T8.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T8.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL (SELECT SUM(DFA_AMT) AS DFA_AMT, MAX(ACDBT_DT) AS ACDBT_DT FROM TB_CBBO_DFA_IZ -- 대손기본 WHERE CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND DFA_PROCS_YN = 'Y' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') T9 ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_REDF_ADSB_BAS T10 --되물림재지급기본 ON T10.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T10.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T11 --채권계약기본 ON T11.BASE_YM = T1.SL_CL_YM AND T11.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T11.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_FEDD_BU_NOTI_RGST_HIST -- 부담통보등록이력 WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND HIST_CH_DTM <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY HIST_CH_DTM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) T12 ON T12.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T12.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL T13 --계약결제관계 ON T13.DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T13.DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T13.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SUBSTR(T13.VL_STRT_DTM, 1, 6) <= T1.SL_CL_YM AND SUBSTR(T13.VL_END_DTM, 1, 6) >= T1.SL_CL_YM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS T14 -- 계약결제기본 ON T14.CNTR_STLM_ID = T13.CNTR_STLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL (SELECT VAC_BNK_CD, VAC_NO FROM (SELECT VACI.* , DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY VAC_IS_CST_NO ORDER BY VAC_IS_DTM DESC, VAC_RGST_DTM DESC, VAC_IS_ID DESC) AS RANK -- DTM이 중복건이 있어서 최종발급ID 추가 FROM TB_RVDW_VAC_IS_IZ VACI WHERE VACI.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND VACI.VAC_IS_DV_CD = '5' -- 가상계좌발급구분코드 5:연체집금용 AND VACI.VAC_IS_CST_NO = T1.CST_NO ) -- 가상계좌발급고객번호 WHERE RANK = 1) T15 ON 1=1 WHERE T1.SL_CL_YM = (SELECT MAX(SL_CL_YM) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}) AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}

SELECT SUBSTR(A.SL_CL_YM,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SL_CL_YM,5) AS SL_CL_YM -- 기준년월(CW49.CWPAYY) , A.CNTR_NO , A.CNTR_SN , NVL(B.DLQ_MCN, 0) AS DLQ_MCN -- 연체개월(CW49.CWDCNT) , NVL(B.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) AS EOT_DLQ_AMT -- 연체금액(CW49.CWDAMT) , (CASE WHEN C.CLCTAM_DV_CD IS NOT NULL THEN C.CLCTAM_DV_CD || '.' || (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'CLCTAM_DV_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = C.CLCTAM_DV_CD) ELSE '' END) AS CLCTAM_DV_CD_NM -- 집금구분(CW49.CWPGUB) , C.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AS CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO -- 집금유형담당(CW49.CWPCDE) , NVL((SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT, 0)*-1 END) FROM TB_CBCL_BZNS_ATAM_BAS --영업선수금기본 WHERE SUBSTR(RVE_DT, 1, 6) <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SL_CL_YM||'01')-1, 'YYYYMM') AND CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND DTA_DL_YN ='N' ), 0) AS SL_DP_AGG_AMT -- 납입금액(CW49.CWPAMT) , A.THM_ISTM_TOT_DP_AMT AS THM_INTAM_DP_AMT -- 당월할부금입금금액(CW49.CWAMT3) , A.CNTRAM_DP_AMT AS CRP_UC_AMT -- 당월계약금입금금액 , A.SELL_AMT AS SELL_AMT -- 판매금(CW49.CWTAMT) , A.ISTM_MCN || '*' || A.MM_ISTM_AMT ||'원' AS ISTM_INFO-- 할부개월*할부금액(CW49.CWMONT||'*'||CW49.CWMAMT||'원' ) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ A -- WELLS매출월마감내역 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS B --연체기본 ON A.SL_CL_YM = B.PERF_YM AND A.CNTR_NO = B.CNTR_NO AND A.CNTR_SN = B.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS C --채권기본 ON A.SL_CL_YM = C.BASE_YM AND A.CNTR_NO = C.CNTR_NO AND A.CNTR_SN = C.CNTR_SN WHERE A.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND A.SELL_TP_CD = '1' -- 일시불 AND A.SL_CL_YM < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(A.SL_CL_YM,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SL_CL_YM,5) AS SL_CL_YM -- 기준년월(CW49.CWPAYY) , A.CNTR_NO , A.CNTR_SN , NVL(B.DLQ_MCN, 0) AS DLQ_MCN -- 연체개월(CW49.CWDCNT) , NVL(B.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) AS EOT_DLQ_AMT -- 연체금액(CW49.CWDAMT) , (CASE WHEN C.CLCTAM_DV_CD IS NOT NULL THEN C.CLCTAM_DV_CD || '.' || (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'CLCTAM_DV_CD' AND CD_VLD_VAL = C.CLCTAM_DV_CD) ELSE '' END) AS CLCTAM_DV_CD_NM -- 집금구분(CW49.CWPGUB) , C.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AS CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO -- 집금유형담당(CW49.CWPCDE) , NVL((SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT, 0)*-1 END) FROM TB_CBCL_BZNS_ATAM_BAS --영업선수금기본 WHERE CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND DTA_DL_YN ='N' ), 0) AS SL_DP_AGG_AMT -- 납입금액(CW49.CWPAMT) , NVL((SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT, 0)*-1 END) FROM TB_CBCL_BZNS_ATAM_BAS --영업선수금기본 WHERE SUBSTR(RVE_DT, 1, 6) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND DTA_DL_YN ='N' AND RVE_DV_CD = '03' -- 월납입액 ), 0) AS THM_INTAM_DP_AMT , NVL((SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1', '3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT, 0) ELSE NVL(RVE_AMT, 0)*-1 END) FROM TB_CBCL_BZNS_ATAM_BAS --영업선수금기본 WHERE SUBSTR(RVE_DT, 1, 6) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND DTA_DL_YN ='N' AND RVE_DV_CD = '01' -- 계약금
